plot: Amos and Theodore the two bumbling outlaw wannabees from The Apple Dumpling Gang are back. They are trying to make it on their own. When they arrive at the town they are going to, all sorts of things go awry. They accidentally subdue the town's legendary lawman, Wooly Bill Hitchcock thus enraging him into tracking them down. They also are accused of bank robbery. And they &"enlist&" in the army, and burn down the fort. Amid all this the army is beseiged by someone stealing their supplies.
title: The Apple Dumpling Gang Rides Again

cast.role: Pvt. Jeff Reed aka Capt. Phillips
cast.name: Tim Matheson
